p.s: In the extract Is the usefulness of unions coming to an end? The answer is yes, published in The Gulf News on November 24th, 2011, the author Brian Pollard argues against unions of our time.
According to him unions have outlived their previous purpose.
In his view their role has been replaced by legislation and regulation and thus the unions do more harm than good.
Brian Pollard argues unions are hindering competition against foreign and non-union procedures, while leaving no incentive to work at one's best.
Today's unions are the ones mainly resposibleresponsible for the economic mess of today.
